column4: hey, every time I try to copy a skin folder to /usr/share/amsn/skins I get the message : Error while moving
I am logged as root
please anyone?
how is the skin dir named?
aMSN Live-1.0
Im trying to copy that to /usr/share/amsn/skins
but I keep getting an error message I think it has to do with permissions?
change it to AMSN_Live-1.0 and try it again.
im just moving the folder with the mouse
dragging it
nope still same message
I can't copy it, I click copy and then right click on /usr/share/amsn/skins there is no paste button
and your doing this as root in a gui?
what is the command line to copy a folder from a location to another location
I am logged as root in the console gcleric but im doing it with the grafical interface like windows
cp -R dir /path/to/new/location
dir as in the amsn live skin folder?
yup!
it worked!
sweet! =)
but why can't I do it with the gf interface :(
thanks mate
no worries! =)
